original_title: Returned to This: A Punk/Metal/Goth Doc
overview: A personal, emotional look into 25 plus years of the San Antonio punk rock, metal, and goth scene through the eyes of Veronica (the filmmaker/AKA Ronnie Stich) as she returns to her hometown after 15 years and interviews musicians and artists she knew or had a connection to. Since moving away and becoming a novelist, Veronica discovers many changes in the music scene she was once a part of. It is a return that also includes self-discovery, hardship and unexpected pain.
tagline: A snapshot of San Antonio Punk in the early 1990's.
title: Returned to This: A Punk/Metal/Goth Doc
